title: Matt Stone
summary: Matthew Richard Stone[2] (born May 26, 1971)[3] is an American actor, animator, writer, producer, and composer. He is known for co-creating South Park (1997â€“present) and co-developing The Book of Mormon (2011) with his creative partner Trey Parker. Stone was interested in film and music as a child and at high school, and attended the University of Colorado, Boulder, where he met Parker. The two collaborated on various short films, and starred in the feature-length musical Cannibal! The Musical (1993).
